column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of YBa(Co1−xMx)4O7 with (M = Ce, Zr, La Ga, In and Al), were synthesized from precursor powders prepared by EDTA (ethylene-diaminetetraacetic acid) polymerized complex method.

#Text=Y(NO3)3·6H2O (≥99.0%, Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd.), Ce(NO3)3·6H2O (≥99.0%, Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd.), Zr(NO3)3·4.5H2O (≥99.0%, Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd.), In(NO3)3·6H2O (≥99.0%, Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd.), Ba(NO3)2 (≥99.5% Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd.), Co(NO3)2·6H2O (≥99.0%, Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd.), Al(NO3)3·9H2O (≥99.0%, Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd.), Ga] were used as starting materials.
#Text=Stoichiometric amounts of these powders were dissolved in deionized water with vigorous stirring in which EDTA/NH3 solution was added as a complexion agent [14], [15], [16], [17].
#Text=The mixed solution was heated at 40 °C under continuous stirring condition for 4 h and the complex solution was dried at 120 °C for 2 h.
#Text=The obtained solid was fired at 800 °C in air during 8 h.
